title: Murder on Middle Beach (Pt 1)
description:
Today on True Story, Tig and Cheryl wade into the first 2 episodes of the 4-part doc "Murder on Middle Beach," available to watch on HBO! It's been a while since our doc duo has dived into a true crime doc, and they both find its personal approach to the genre fascinating. Plus, some truly crazy pyramid scheme stories! *this episode spills beans* get merch at podswag.com/truestory (tigandcheryltruestory@gmail.com)

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
